general_advisory: Ensure proper crop management practices based on the weather conditions mentioned. Be vigilant for disease outbreaks and take necessary precautions.

advisory: Spray Validamycin 3% L @ 400-ml/acre for Stem rot disease control.
Spray Chlorothalonil 75% WP @ 400g/acre for Tikka disease management.
Thinning and hand weeding for 15-day-old crop.
Spray Profenophos 50% EC @ 400ml/acre for Leaf Weber control.
Use varieties like Utkal tarini, Utkal Madhuri, Utkal kesari, etc.
Apply decomposed FYM in the soil before sowing.
Seed treatment with Carbendazim 50% WP @ 2g/kg of seeds.
Practice crop rotation with pulses, oilseeds, marigold, etc.
Seed treatment with Plantomycin or Streptocycline.
Prepare poison bait for Fruit fly management.
Use poison baits or Spinosad for control.
Keep goat sheds clean and dry.
